title: Adobe XD 44.0.12 – Design, test, and prototype both websites and mobile applications
content: Adobe XD (formerly known as Adobe Experience Design CC) aims to provide full support to UX designers that are trying to improve the way in which users interact with their product. The app allows you to develop both websites and mobile apps and helps you test the outcome and generate prototypes.   UX design tool that […]

title: Adobe Animate CC 2021 21.0.9 – Environment for creating interactive content
content: Animate CC (was Flash CC) lets you share work directly from within the application and get access to new features the moment they’re released. Your entire creative world, together in one place. Work faster than ever before with a 64-bit architecture, a new streamlined user interface, and more connected tools. Create HTML content and export high-definition […]

title: Satellite Reign 1.13.06 – A real-time, class-based strategy game
content: Satellite Reign is a real-time, class-based strategy game, set in an open-world cyberpunk city. You command a group of 4 agents through rain-soaked, neon-lit streets, where the law is the will of mega-corporations. Use your agents to sneak, shoot, steal, and sabotage your way up the corporate ladder, and take control of the most powerful […]

title: CopyClip 2.9.98.9 – Clipboard manager
content: CopyClip 2 is the slickest and most efficient premium clipboard manager for your Mac. Running discreetly from your menu bar, the app stores all that you have copied or cut in the past, allowing you to quickly find that snippet of text you’ve been looking for.   Key Features: Ability to store up to 230 […]

title: Hearts of Iron IV 1.10.8 – World War II Strategy & Simulation Game
content: Years before Europe went to war, Japan’s imperial ambitions targeted the divided Chinese Republic. Crippled by political paralysis and centuries of fitful development, China is still not a pushover. With vast reserves of manpower and resources, not to mention a giant landmass, the Republic of China and its temporary ally, the Communists under Mao, can […]

title: Humankind 1.0.3.248 Beta – Turn-Based Strategy & Historical Game
content: HUMANKIND is a historical strategy game, where you’ll be re-writing the entire narrative of human history and combining cultures to create a civilization that’s as unique as you are.   CREATE YOUR CIVILIZATION  Combine up to 60 historical cultures as you lead your people from the Ancient to the Modern Age. From humble origins as […]

title: Screen Snapshot 5.4.0 – Screenshots with various options
content: Screen Snapshot (was iSnapshot) is a fast, user-friendly and efficient utilities for screenshot.   Features: Supports three capture modes(Full screen, Window, Selection) Supports capture the cursor within full screen capture mode Supports delay capture within full screen capture mode Supports window snapshot excluding shadow in window capture mode Supports capture toggle between mouse selection within […]

title: 1Click Duplicate Finder 2.3.0 – Clean duplicate files, photos
content: 1Click Duplicate Finder helps you to free up gigabytes of storage space through finding duplicates, similar and large files. It can detect duplicate, similar and large files anywhere in Mac, including photos, music, and even external drives, and delete them safely and quickly free up disk.   Fastest Scanning Scan thousands of files in one […]

title: WidsMob PhotoVault 3.9 – Application to encrypt and hide photos from others
content: WidsMob PhotoVault helps you to encrypt and hide photos in JPEG from others. It has two different Security levels: standard level to hide photos high level to make restrictions to export, share your photos or enter Preferences.   Features: Enables you to Lock Screen for different purposes Preview a slideshow on photo vault. In order […]

title: Mosaic Pro 1.3.3 – Professional Window Management
content: Mosaic is a powerful window manager that allows easy repositioning and resizing of macOS apps, transforming multi-window chaos into a productive suite of tools.   Mosaic has been meticulously designed to feel like an integrated component of macOS — and not like a standalone app. The result is a seamless and intuitive experience that feels […]
